entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 3:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 2 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: SSW 36 km/h gust 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
